DOC.brief_summary: Mapping Human Muscle Satellite Cell Fate By Real-Time Imaging
DOC.brief_title: Mapping Human Muscle Satellite Cell Fate By Real-Time Imaging
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study obtain human muscle sample cell culture analyze muscle cell development real-time uncover factor influence growth .
DOC.criteria: men 2029 yr BMI 20 34.9 Fasting Glucose < 110 mg/dL Blood Pressure < 160/100mm Hg NonDiabetic LDLCholesterol < 160mg/dL Triacylglycerol < 400 mg/dL Makers kidney , liver , heart function within 10 % clinical normalcy < 1.5hr /wk habitual aerobic exercise training resistance exercise training past 6 month men < 20or > 29 yr BMI < 20 > 34.9 Fasting Glucose > 110 mg/dL Blood Pressure > 160/100mm Hg NonDiabetic LDLCholesterol > 160mg/dL Triacylglycerol > 400 mg/dL Preexisting kidney liver condition > 1.5hr /wk habitual aerobic exercise training resistance exercise training past 6 month Currently take prescribe blood thinner
